name: RTCPeerConnection.getReceivers
description: The RTCPeerConnection.getReceivers() method returns an array of RTCRtpReceiver objects, each of which represents one RTP receiver. Each RTP receiver manages the reception and decoding of data for a MediaStreamTrack on an RTCPeerConnection

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: RTCPeerConnection.getReceivers() - WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
